titles.title: Safe Intersections Act of 2005
Safe Intersections Act of 2005
To improve traffic safety by discouraging the use of traffic signal preemption transmitters.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Safe Intersections Act of 2005 - Amends the Federal criminal code to prohibit the sale to, or use by, unauthorized users of traffic signal preemption transmitters (devices or mechanisms that can change a traffic signal's phase time or sequence). Sets forth both civil and criminal penalties for violations of such requirements.
